meta.created_by: Caesar — AI-generated, hand-edited for tone and accuracy
meta.notes: Top-3 highest-fit prospects. Each gets a 3-email sequence: initial → 3-day follow-up → 5-day final. All emails MX-verified via email-verifier.js (100% confidence).

sequence.subject: Agency growth at Parakeeto
sequence.body:
Hi Marcel,

You've built something impressive — helping agencies actually measure profitability is a genuinely hard problem.

Here's what I'm thinking about though: even the agencies on Parakeeto still need to fill their own pipeline. And most agency founders tell me the same thing — their cold outreach emails start feeling generic after the first few months. Reply rates drop. Growth slows.

We built an AI system that writes each outbound email from scratch based on the prospect's actual business — no templates. Agencies we've worked with went from 1-2% reply rates to 6-8% in their first campaign.

Would it be worth a quick 15 minutes to see what that looks like in practice?

Caesar
Founder, Caesar's Legions

sequence.subject: Re: Agency growth at Parakeeto
sequence.body:
Hi Marcel,

Just bumping this — didn't want it to get buried.

If agency outbound isn't a priority right now, totally get it. But if it is, I have a specific breakdown of how we drove results for a similar B2B SaaS — happy to share.

Either way, congrats on what you're building.

Caesar

sequence.subject: One quick offer, then I'm gone
sequence.body:
Marcel,

Last message. We run free 50-email test campaigns for founders who want to see our system live — zero cost, zero obligation.

If the timing ever feels right, just reply "yes" and I'll have it running by end of week.

Otherwise — wish you and Parakeeto well.

Caesar

sequence.subject: CoSchedule's next growth lever
sequence.body:
Hi Garrett,

200K+ marketers is a serious number. You've clearly nailed product-market fit.

The hard part usually comes next: scaling from SMB to enterprise means your outbound has to get a lot more sophisticated — and fast. Generic cold emails don't close enterprise marketing teams.

We built an AI cold email system that researches each target individually and writes emails that actually sound like someone did their homework. Founders at your stage using it are booking enterprise meetings in their first week — without hiring a sales team.

Quick 15-min call to see how it works? I can walk you through an example written for a company in your space.

Caesar
Founder, Caesar's Legions

sequence.subject: Re: CoSchedule's next growth lever
sequence.body:
Garrett,

Following up — if enterprise outbound isn't the focus right now, totally get it. With 200K users, inbound is probably doing heavy lifting.

But if you're thinking about accelerating enterprise sales, I've got a concrete example of how AI-written outreach changed the game for a martech company similar to yours. Happy to share — just reply.

Caesar

sequence.subject: Free test — no strings
sequence.body:
Garrett,

Last one from me. We offer free 50-email test campaigns so you can see actual results before ever spending a dollar.

Interested? Reply "yes" and I'll set it up this week.

If not — best of luck scaling CoSchedule. You're building something the market clearly needs.

Caesar

sequence.subject: You help teams hit numbers. How are yours doing?
sequence.body:
Hi Travis,

You sell sales performance — so you already know that a 25% lift isn't magic. It's system design.

Here's what I keep thinking: most sales-tool founders I've talked to have a blind spot. They optimize their clients' outreach obsessively but never apply the same rigor to their own pipeline.

Is Ambition's outbound hitting the same numbers you promise your customers?

We built an AI cold email system that does exactly that — researches each target, writes from scratch, tracks what works. Sales teams using it see measurable lift in week one.

Would be good to compare notes. 15 minutes this week?

Caesar
Founder, Caesar's Legions

sequence.subject: Re: You help teams hit numbers. How are yours doing?
sequence.body:
Travis,

Quick bump. If Ambition's outbound is already dialed in — great, I'd genuinely love to compare approaches.

If it's not — I have a specific case study showing how we improved reply rates for a sales enablement company. Happy to share it.

Caesar

sequence.subject: Last thought
sequence.body:
Travis,

Final message. We run free 50-email test campaigns — you'd see what AI-written cold email actually looks like for your ICP before spending anything.

Interested? Just reply "run it" and I'll have it live by end of week.

Either way — the gamification angle you're building with Ambition is underrated. Good work.

Caesar
